title: 92/86/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 December 1991 on certain adaptations of measures covered by Regulation (EEC) No 4028/86 in the territory of the former German Democratic Republic (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 18 December 1991  on certain adaptations of measures covered by Regulation (EEC) No 4028/86 in the territory of the former German Democratic Republic  (Only the German text is authentic)  (92/86/EEC)
THE COMMISSION  OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: If the German authorities certify that such vessels were used exclusively for fishing activities during the qualifying calendar years in question, the fishing vessels from the former German Democratic Republic shall be eligible for  reimbursement by the Community of premiums paid under Title VII of Regulation (EEC) No 4028/86 in respect of the adjustment of capacity, by way of derogation from the provisions of Articles 23 (1), 23 (2b) and 24 (2b).
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1991. For the Commission
Manuel MARÍN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 353, 17. 12. 1990, p. 10. (2) OJ No L 376, 31. 12. 1986, p. 7. (3) OJ No L 380, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1. (4) OJ No L 67, 12. 3. 1988, p. 14. (5) OJ No L 294, 25. 10. 1991, p. 49.
